page.title: 15WOOLHOPE LIFESTYLES
page.content: Inns {The Butchers Arms Woolhope} The inn lies down a country lane from the village beside a stream. It is a black & white half_timbered building with low beams in the bar & open log fires, but with all modern conveniences. It used to be three cottages, a butchers, & cider houses. It now offers good accommodation, very good bar meals & a splendid modern restaurant with good food. { {The Crown Inn Woolhope The inn is a prominent white building in the centre of the village. Outside there are old mounting steps & a ring in the wall for tethering horses. There is some accommodation. Real ale & cider are available as well as bar snacks & morning coffee.
